review: The bar is very stylish and with special decoration. The music is also very good. Don't expect very warm attitude from the guys at the bar of the beer section. The girl at the cocktail bar was more friendly.
name: Nikolas Belalis

review: A true hidden gem in the center of Kiev. Great place to come enjoy a drink and catchup with friends. ‚Ä¶
name: Constantin L.

review: Good place for a few drinks, nothing fancy but really chill atmosphere. They have a range from cider to a strong liquor. A lot of places to sit inside and outside.
name: Anna Tarapygina

review: Get ready for adventure :) Because your next adventure starts here. Come here, grab a drink, blend in nice and kind people all around the world. And you've done it, you have new friends already. I met a couple of new friends here and I will come back again and again.
name: Yahya Ko√ß

review: Went there two times, male bartender with Jurassic Park t-shirt was super rude. Refused to tell me about cigarettes answered with a simple no and I ended up buying the wrong package. I don't know if he was being racist or not. Not a place with warm feelings.
name: Umut Cihan EN

review: Great place. Good price. Chill atmosphere.
name: Hannes Valdi Stef√°nsson

review: The place to go if your plan is enjoying warm vodka in an eyebrow-rising company. However the place is nice and the prices are okay.
name: Jakub Puchala

review: Garage turned into a bar - brilliant! This is one of the few bars in town were you can get amazing price/value deals. The crowd is "genre specific" mostly young people in their 20s however anyone would be welcome here. Good stop if you're on a bar crawl.
name: Ievgen Mykhailenko

review: A hidden gem in the most colorful city where there is warmth in the hearts and cold beautiful winter. Its a cosy little place with delightful taste of home brewed liquor flavors one better than another - where else can you find lavender, ‚Ä¶
name: Chinmay Bhalke

review: Fantastic place in the centere of Kiev! They have some light food like tart and very nice homemade drinks you should absolutely try while in the city. Very inexpensive, therefore full of young people
name: Tomasz K

review: Took my guests after a walking tour to this place. Very cool ambiance,hidden from the eyes of passers-by, working till late (3 am-4 am) is a big plus. The best time to come is summertime when many people hang out outside
name: Alina Virstiuk

review: Not so sure that I can leave some good feedback here,but it may be due to the quarantine. Some menu positions were absent. Some drinks were if the low quality. And drinks and food are totally overpriced.
name: Julia Bogdanovna (Jay Jay)

review: Lovely venue with hip local youngsters being cosmopolitan and cool. Great atmosphere. But don't order caipi, the worst thing I tried in my life.
name: Ismayil K

review: Very nice and strong cocktails chosen and made by barman/owner as no actual cocktail menu. Well worth a visit as nice in the sunshine to sip the cocktails
name: Rob S

review: Bar?? are u kidding ??some young fellows gathering place in the middle of backstreets. Just because it remains open till dawn.No toilets.
name: G√∂k√ßen Karistiranli

review: a bit small but very comfortable and casually pleasant place

review: One of the best cocktail bar in Kiev. Great variety of sour

review: Nice bar, friendly bartender, quality drinks

review: Was a great place before, now that the owners changed it turned so much worse. I miss the good old ambar

review: Great coffee (although not a focus of this place). Very friendly environment and great people to chat with
